### :sparkles: Implemented Features

*  add templates folder to build

The following templates are used by semantic-release:
- ``CHANGELOG.md.j2``
- ``.release_notes.md.j2``

``parsed_commit_heading.j2`` is included in both to render common commit headings. — rjdbcm &lt;rjdbcm@outlook.com&gt; ([`fff61a8`](https://github.com/OZI-Project/ozi-templates/commit/fff61a8e5279e1905c1fc104c53f3f53a4069220))
